>Hitler was a disaster for the Nationalists of Europe. Moreover, the religion of the Shoah and Hitler's defeat made all NATIONALIST WORD since then, A TABOO.

And to add to that ... we've all heard of the Holocaust by now. But I'm sure most people have never heard of the Holodomor in Ukraine (~10 million deaths by forced starvation from the Soviets; 1932-1933), the Armenian genocide (~1.5M by the Young Turks; 1915), rape of millions of German women and girls AFTER the war, death of ~2.5M million of German people AFTER the war,  and the ~100 millions of deaths by communist regimes.
